response.summary: Professional in Electronic Engineering with experience in administration of UNIX operating systems. Passionate about automating repetitive tasks by creating scripts in bash and playbooks in ansible.
response.skills: Terraform, AWS Lambda, DevOps, Bitbucket, SonarQube, Elastic Stack (ELK), WebLogic, Logstash, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Linux, Bash, AWS CloudFormation, Python, AIX, Red Hat Linux, Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, Grafana

profile_positions.description:
IBM POWER infrastructure management and UNIX operating systems under agile methodology. With the following Main Activitiesand Knowledge:
– AIX and linux implementation servers on POWER or x86 infrastructure.
– Server migration to IBM Cloud - Softlayer.
– AIX 7.1 - 7.2 Administration tasks.
– Linux RHEL 7/8 and SUSE Administration tasks.
– IBM Spectrum Scale Global Parallel File system (GPFS) implementation.
– PowerHA (7.1 / 7.2) Implementation.
– Red Hat High Availability Clustering (pcs and gfs2).
– PowerVM and Vmware Virtualization.
– NIM Server for installation and updates.
– Ansible Server for automation.
– Bash and YAML Scripting for automation of repetitive tasks and internal processes.
– Design, review and implementation of work plans for infrastructure migration, updates and administration tasks.
– Resolution of problems, incidents and technical requirements.
profile_positions.title: UNIX Systems Administrator

profile_positions.description: Basic AIX administration taks. Operating system updates, packagesinstallation,user management and management reports and resourcemonitoring.
profile_positions.title: UNIX Intern

company.name: Valid
company.description:
⁣You may not know it, but we’ve been together for a long time: on your ID, on your phone’s SIM card, on transactions you do online. And we’ve been this close because we look after something that’s only yours: your identity.
⠀⠀
We live in a trust economy. In this economy, identity is the currency and secure identification is what gives it value. Identification is recognizing something or someone as true and, at Valid, we’re more than 7000 people who take care of identification through state-of-the-art technology.
⠀⠀
From card chips to biometry ; from smart city technologies to instant payments, our mission is to create secure and customized services for the identification of people, things and transactions.⠀⠀

Identification is our reason for being. It’d validating one identity between millions. It’s saying “go ahead” in one touch, one click, one look. In seconds.⠀⠀

Let’s go ahead?⠀⠀

***⠀⠀

Talvez você não saiba, mas estamos juntos há tempos: no seu RG, nos seus cartões de banco, nas transações que faz pelo celular. E estamos sempre tão perto porque cuidamos de algo só seu: sua identidade.⠀
⠀
Vivemos na economia da confiança. Nessa economia, a moeda é a identidade. E identificação é o que dá valor a ela. Identificação é reconhecer algo ou alguém como verdadeiro e, na Valid, somos 7000 pessoas que cuidam de identificação com tecnologia de ponta.⠀⠀

Do chip que está no cartão do banco à tecnologia biométrica de identificação de pessoas, passando por smart cities e pagamentos instantâneos, nossa missão é criar serviços seguros e customizados para a identificação de pessoas, objetos e transações.⠀⠀

Identificação é nossa razão de ser. É validar uma identidade entre milhões. É dizer “vá em frente” em um toque, um clique, um olhar. Em segundos.⠀
⠀
Vamos em frente?
